changes.comment: Setting initial scrollbar height and width equal to 0 to prevent rendering when it's width/height changes from undefined to 0. Cascading updates caused due to notifySubscribers for sticky componentDidMount lifecycle hook. Reducing computations for sticky component by combining updates for change in sticky state (top/bottom/non-sticky) & distanceFromTop. Setting placeHolder width equal to scrollWidth of nonStickyContent.firstElementChild
